title: Webinar: Morningstar Solutions for Financial Advisors
text:
For those of you with questions about the new Morningstar.com interface, we are hosting a webinar tomorrow at 11AM CDT! Attendees will learn about Morningstar’s tools for financial advisors with Darrin Thomas and Rajat Trehan, senior product managers for Morningstar.com, and Casey Macdonald, customer engagement manager for Morningstar Advisor Workstation.

What will you learn? New ways to engage with clients and prospects using Morningstar data and research.

How to organize around function in the new Morningstar.com interface.

What is different between Morningstar.com and Morningstar Advisor Workstation.

Anyone who registers will receive a recording of the event, so if you can’t join us tomorrow, you can still watch the webcast! Register: https://go.morningstar.com/MorningstarSolutionsforFinancialAdvisorsWebinar
